gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.data

Class RSAMData

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.data.GenericDataMatrix
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.data.RSAMData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryDataSet

    public class RSAMData
extends GenericDataMatrix
    A class that deals with RSAM data. The data are stored in a 2-D matrix, the first column is the time (j2ksec), the second is the data.
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli

    • Constructor Detail

      • RSAMData

        public RSAMData()
        Generic empty constructor

      • RSAMData

        public RSAMData(ByteBuffer bb)
        Create an RSAMData from a byte buffer. This first 4 bytes specify an integer number of rows followed by rows*16 bytes, 2 doubles: j2ksec and RSAM.
        Parameters:
        bb - the byte buffer

      • RSAMData

        public RSAMData(ByteBuffer bb,
        int period)
        Create an RSAMData from a byte buffer. This first 4 bytes specify an integer number of rows followed by rows*16 bytes, 2 doubles: j2ksec and RSAM.
        Parameters:
        bb - the byte buffer
        period - the RSAM period

      • RSAMData

        public RSAMData(List<double[]> list)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        list - list of matrix rows

      • countEvents

        public void countEvents(double threshold,
               double ratio,
               double maxLength)
        Loops for data matrix, scans columns and fills events matrix
        Parameters:
        threshold - event treshold
        ratio - minimum ratio between new and older value to define event
        maxLength - maximum event length (ms)
